description: Hello, I'm Giuseppe Bianchi and welcome into my personal space. I'm a Front-End and Mobile Apps Developer, writing code for Gran Sasso Science Institute and studing CS at University of L'Aquila, Italy.
bio:
Hello, I'm Giuseppe Bianchi and welcome into my personal space.

I'm a Front-End and Mobile Apps Developer and I study Computer Science at University of L'Aquila, Italy. My graduation is not so far, but, even if I have to complete my studies, I'm currently working for Gran Sasso Science Institute as Web Developer, keeping learning new stuff by myself or studying in deep arguments of exams taken.
Now I'm learning ReactJS, to build single-page web application, and Swift language, to develop iOS native apps, because with Apache Cordova or React Native I can't reach what I really want to do.

company_works.subject: Mobile App UI Design and Front-End Development

company_works.description: I've upgraded a ESA webpage, adding Javascript animations.

company_works.subject: Frontend and Mobile Development
company_works.description:
Building views and mini-games by using CSS3, JS and HTML5 for The Alphabet of the Universe, a touch-book for CERN.
Then I made an animation by using CSS3, JS and HTML5 for ESA.

company_works.subject: Mobile App Development
company_works.description:
Upgrading Frascati Scienza App. Adds: Share Buttons,
Multi-Language, Notification System.

company_works.subject: Frontend Development
company_works.description: Edipro presentation website to show features about moving to a digital solution.
